waypoints.onload:
include ("../../includes/afterCrash.lua")
questNPC = 119856 questID = 425124 questTargets = {106474, 106475, 106476} settings.profile.mobs = questTargets
player.free_counter1 = UMMD_chooseClass (68, 'which class to accept quest?') player.free_counter2 = UMMD_chooseClass (61, 'which class to complete quest?')
changeProfileOption ('WAYPOINT_DEVIATION', 0) changeProfileOption ('MAX_TARGET_DIST', 50) changeProfileOption ('LOOT', false)
function isFirstClass () player:update () return (player.Class1 == player.free_counter1) end
function isSecondClass () player:update () return (player.Class1 == player.free_counter2) end
function swapClasses (class1, class2, npc) if player.Class1 ~= class1 then -- swap classes player:target_NPC (npc or 110758) if getZoneId ()==400 then RoMScript ('ChoiceListDialogOption (1)') yrest (750) else RoMScript ('ChoiceOption (3)') yrest (750) end RoMScript ('ExchangeClass ('..(class1+1)..', '..(class2+1)..')') yrest (2000) player:update () end while getZoneId()==400 do -- leaving home player:target_NPC (110758) RoMScript ('ChoiceListDialogOption (0)') waitForLoadingScreen () end end
function checkFunc (address) local pawn = CPawn (address) return (pawn and pawn.Attackable) end
waypoints.waypoint:
if getQuestStatus (questID) == "complete" then if isSecondClass () then player:target_NPC (questNPC) -- Anthony Taz CompleteQuestByName (questID) yrest (750) else __WPL:setWaypointIndex (__WPL:findWaypointTag ("weiter")) return end end
local dqCount, dqTotal = RoMScript ('Daily_count ()') if dqCount>=dqTotal then if player.Level==64 then print ('\a\a\a') player:logout () elseif inventory:itemTotalCount (202434)>0 then inventory:useItem (202434) else print ('\a\ano more tq cards left') error ('') end end
if getQuestStatus (questID)=="not accepted" then if isFirstClass () then player:target_NPC (questNPC) -- Anthony Taz AcceptQuestByName (questID) yrest (750) else __WPL:setWaypointIndex (__WPL:findWaypointTag ("weiter")) return end end
message ('quest status: '..getQuestStatus (questID)..' - first class aktive: '..tostring (isFirstClass ()))
if isFirstClass () and getQuestStatus (questID)=="incomplete" then player:target_NPC (questNPC) -- Anthony Taz sendMacro ("ChoiceOption (1)") if player.Mounted then player:dismount () end end

if isFirstClass () and getQuestStatus (questID) == "incomplete" then local timer = 10 while timer > 0 do local target = player:findNearestNameOrId (questTargets, nil, checkFunc) if target then player:target (target) player:fight () end if getQuestStatus (questID)=="complete" then timer=0 end yrest (150) timer = timer - 1 end end __WPL:setWaypointIndex (__WPL:findWaypointTag ("Kampfausbilder"))
if not player.Mounted then player:mount () end

if getQuestStatus (questID) == "complete" then if not isSecondClass () then message ('switch to second class') swapClasses (player.free_counter2, player.free_counter1, 120185) end elseif getQuestStatus (questID) == "not accepted" then if not isFirstClass () then message ('switch to first class') swapClasses (player.free_counter1, player.free_counter2, 120185) end player:update () end message ('quest status: '..getQuestStatus (questID)..' - first class aktive: '..tostring (isFirstClass ())) player:mount ()
